Blog.post: so i heard from my friends that another friend of ours is shippin off soon to go to the army.now i wouldnt go to the army one i would fail the training cause im so dam lazy and two id prefer not to have some stick in the ass cowboy hat wearin moron scream at me. but anyways hes gonna have to go through 9 weeks of training and then hes gettin shipped to europe i believe. then after training hell be gone for 6 yrs. 6 dam yrs that a long time for anyone to be away from home but i think he can handle. but anyways hes havin a goin away party wit all of us. all the guys gonna be there. but there aint gonna be no dam boos cause his family gonna be there and we cant drink darn it all to hell.meh fuck it i dont drink anyways but still its the prinsiple of the thing. but im sittin here waitin for my dumb shit friends to call me so i can go and the butt holes aint callin. i should kill them. but na i gotta be nice cause our friend is leavin. but i will get them later. yes i will. MUHAHAHAHAHAHAHA. i need my pills..........excuse me.

now this is just a small shout out to a friend of mine named cupcake. now im sry i did this late but we werent talkin at the time i did my other shout out so heres one now.YO CUPCAKE WATS UP GIRL. lol there ya go. if any of u ppl have yahoo check out cupcake_2000_87 lovely lil smile. tell me wat u think of her. shes so darn cute, lol. sry cupcake

Now Mr.B gotta be one of the biggest bitches out there.Has to be the worst Pres since........shit his daddy. Shit the man talkin bout war wit ppl THAT ARE PAYIN HIS FAMILY MONEY. wtf talk about back stabbin. Shit the man talkin about of snap yall we got ours asses hit on 9/11 and now we gotta retaliate against those bastards. his punk ass new about it and for all yall true democrats out there yall know hes a fake. shit soon as mike moore put out his moive he gettin hella controversy cause he speaks the truth. Shit B is a lyin motha fucka. ok so went went to war cause of nuclear that we gave them wich makes no fuckin sense to me. then when we get there........THERE AINT NO FUCKING WEAPONS. na na the only thing B wants is the fuckin oil. and naturally he couldnt just go and get the oil na he had say that there was weapons. i cant believe that u republicans out there actually like B fagget ass. yall sum messed up ppl. but watever that sun of a bitch better not wint this eclection or this country goin to hell again. but at last id like to say FUCK REPUBLICANS DEMOCRATS RULE THIS BITCH!!!

now if ur the kinda guy who has a girlfriend then this really dont have much for u. but for the rest of u and this means girls to. ever walk around somewhere and see ppl so happy and u just think.......BLAH. i hate that hugy kisy bullshit that some ppl would call love. yea right............love. LMAO. love is a made up word for ppl who just cant admit that they wanna screw the person they wit. two ppl can go out and they can say ooooooo i love u so much. but as soon as one of them find someone better its like see ya by. wheres the love. shouldnt two ppl who are in love be together i mean they are in love arent they? no love is just some word made up by ppl who cant admit to the person they are dating that the only reason they are together is because they wanna get a piece of ass. i hate walking around and see all this happy time bull shit. wat the fuck is with that. i dont wanna walk down the dam street and see two ppl tongin each other. save that shit for cars and bedrooms i mean thats y they are there. i think the worst gotta be when u know the ppl that are dating or possibly just one of them. then its just like a happy time is over NOW TIME TO RAM U IN THE HEAD WITH THE 9 iron. if love was so true then y do so many ppl that say the love the other end up hating eachothers guts. when ppl get married they say o i love u. and they stay in the realationship for 60 or so yrs. and when u ask them they say im with him/her cause i love him/her. aaaaa horseshit. i would guess that 9 times outta 10 the ppl stay together becuase of children and they dont wanna hurt them. and by the time thats done and ur kids are gone ur still stuck wit the same person. and by then ur so old u couldnt get someone new if u had a 10inch dick and house made of gold...............well then again there are some GOLDDIGGERS out there but how pathetic do u have to be to get with a rich old person, fuck them to death, then take all their money...........wait actually thats pretty smart but cmon how many ppl do u know that would want some old limp dig or worse.............old, dried out, extremely worn out pussy. YUCK. the shits just scary. but still in the end the love will end cause most of the time its not love they feel for a person its the boner that the guy may have in his pants. all in all these luvy duvy ppl i believe should be knocked upside the head with a couple taped up bibles.

u ever get the feeling like somebody u know is keeping something from u or might possibly just not be telling u something. Do u ever talk with ppl u know and u get the feeling like they have hidden ideals and feelings about u. or maybe that they can say one thing and mean the complete opposite of what they said.i seem to get that feeling about ppl i meet all the time. like they say or ur funny, but they really think ur a boring moron. or maybe possibly they say o i like u, and in truth they cant stand u and possibly wish for u to be hit by a truck. or maybe they say ooooo i care about u some much, AND WAT THEY REALLY MEAN IS....................i think ur lower then dog shit and id shoot u if i was carrying my gun.well i get that alot.dam everyone. live ur life the way u want. never care about anyone cause u never know when that person might turn around and stab u in the back. and i dont mean metaphoricly i mean literally. keep sharp objects away from ppl u know. they may just get tired of u and decide to stab u. just some things to think about.

i just wanna say WAZ UP to a couple of my friends. God, Shyone, and Nyte hope ur all doin good. Nyte keep hope and all of ur ideas will come true.................god i sound like a fortune teller. BLAH!!

so i found out that my best friend and my other friend are gonna be datin. wow did that piss me off. for privacy reasons and for the the fact that i dont want my friends to kick my balls into my stomach ima call them jack and jill. so jills my best friend and me and her are close like real close and then i heard that shes gonna date jack. so naturally i did wat any guy would do who had feelings for someone i got pissed and thought about raming a sword in jacks heart.............well maybe im the only one who thinks about that but anyways. they datin now and i got over it but then i got pissed again cause he robbed it in my face. so dam all the luck that my dumbassfriend got someone who all u guys would prolly drool over hell i still cant believe someone as hot as her would ever talk to me. but i finally told jack how i felt. and when i sai i told him i mean i swore and yelled at him. but u know wat i figured i aint two friendships over this so i took the stick out of my ass and now we cool. jack........u lucky bastard i hate u. and jill...............jacks a lucky bastard. one thing i ask from the both of u, at the wedding makes sure theres lots of beer cause thats a day i dont wanna remember. I LOVE U BOTH MUHAHAHAHAHAHA.

well hi de ho motha fuckas. i ladies and gents im Death and for all u who think im weird for having a nickname like death......Fuck u. well anyways now that we got the formalities out of the way i finally decided to make a site after listening to a friend of mine. u can see him bitch and moan at urlLink www.joshpeterson.blogspot.com . well anyways i look forward to bitching to all of u and possibly making u rethink u lives.
